title: nsip-subscription
description: Subscribers are a subset of Service Users, part of the PINS Data Model

subscriptionId.description: The unique identifier within the Back Office. Ignored as part of register-nsip-subscription.

caseReference.description: the case reference the subscription relates to

subscriptionType.description: which update does the subscriber want to get notified of. For multiple types, use multiple messages.

startDate.description: The date to start getting updates

endDate.description: The date to stop getting updates
